title: Got a popup telling me I had gotten ~70,000 BE coming to me, didn't actually get anything..
body: I don't know if this is a common issue or not, but with the transition I got a popup from my loot menu telling me I was going to get 70,000 BE as a reward of some kind for my runes/pages/etc, and I got absolutely nothing.. Is anyone else experiencing this, and is there a fix?

replies.body: That message was probably letting you know that you would have a new grand total of about 70,000, not that you would be getting an additional 70K. If that's wrong, feel free to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can double check everything there!
See, I thought that was how it worked, but I only got like 5 of those orbs, and it said I was going to get 70k BE, so either way I'm out like 50k..
you get them in the loot section, they're rewarded as orbs
